name: Pinobee: Wings of Adventure
description:
Pinobee: Wings of Adventure, known in Japan as Pinobee no Daibouken (ピノビイーの大冒険, lit. "Pinobee's Great Adventure"), is a platformer for the Game Boy Advance, developed by Artoon and published by Hudson Soft. The game was released as a launch title for the system, on March 21, 2001 in Japan and June 11, 2001 in North America. A version was developed for PlayStation in 2002, simply titled Pinobee outside Japan.

A sequel, Pinobee and Phoebee, was released only in Japan in 2002.
